ygData.subject: Re: Galvatron makes an impact
ygData.msgSnippet: Galvatron smiled at the foolish bot. He could sense his power a mile away. As he shot of his energy he flew straight backwards. He watched as the beams landed

Message-ID: <b2.f7a6c88.27877f4e@...>
Date: Fri, 5 Jan 2001 14:49:34 EST
Subject: Re: Galvatron makes an impact
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: kinger01030@...

 Galvatron smiled at the foolish bot. He could sense his power a mile away. 
As he shot of his energy he flew straight backwards. He watched as the beams 
landed in the ground about 10 feet in front of him.  He jettisoned straight 
up. He was behind the bot now. His gigantic mouth attempted to take a bite 
out of the bots left shoulder. As he did so he released his flame energy on 
the the bots upper body which should cause him major damage to his shoulder 
ability. his three barrel cannons on each knee fired a few rounds at the bots 
lower back. His tail whipped between the bots legs and sped to go right 
through the bots chest. Out of his arm popped the flame sword and he struck 
at the bots right arm with it.
